subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Brawn team made its Formula One testing debut, with Jenson Button setting the fourth-fastest time at the Circuit de Catalunya in Barcelona, Spain. It marked the team’s first full test since Ross Brawn announced last week he bought out the former Honda team, clearing the way for a full lineup of 20 cars at the Australian Grand Prix this month. Button showed the new BGP 001 car will be competitive, clocking his best time of 1 minute 21.140 seconds after 82 laps. BMW Sauber’s Nick Heidfeld was fastest in 1:20.338, with Ferrari’s Kimi Raikkonen and Toyota’s Jarno Trulli also topping the Brawn car. brawn.
